title: Explained: How COVID-19 triggers severe brain inflammation, damages neurons
description: Covid-19 patients commonly report having headaches, confusion and other neurological symptoms but doctors do not fully understand how the disease targets the brain during infection.
content:

title: Exercise May Reduce Depression, Boost Effects of Therapy: Study
description: For the first study, the researchers recruited 30 adults who were experiencing major depressive episodes. The participants filled out electronic surveys immediately before, half-way-through and after a 30-minute session of either moderate-intensity cycling or sitting, and then 25-, 50- and 75-minutes post-workout. Exercise May Reduce Depression, Boost Effects of Therapy: Study.
content: Washington, April 2: Exercising for half an hour may reduce symptoms of depression for at least 75 minutes post-workout and amplify the benefits of therapy, according to a new study led by researchers at the Iowa State University. The findings of the... [5124 chars]

title: Dementia: Study shows disease may be linked to high cholesterol levels
